title: BIG FACTS feat. CAM KIRK & SONNY DIGITAL
itunes:title: BIG FACTS feat. CAM KIRK & SONNY DIGITAL
description:
Legendary photographer CAM KIRK joins BIG FACTS to discuss his come up, memorable career moments and new business ventures.

Super Producer SONNY DIGITAL pulls up as well to talk about the ups and downs of working with artist and signing artist.

Visit

www.bigfactspod.com
